name: unreflective

unreflective adjective
(NOT THINKING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
disapproving not thinking carefully about something, or not showing careful thought: He argues that their unreflective, politically unaware outlook is typical of their generation. Her writing is honest but surprisingly unreflective. Compare
reflective

(NOT TYPICAL)
not typical of how something actually is: unreflective of He argued that the demonstrations were small and unreflective of local sentiments.

Society could no longer be represented by modes of civic ritual which came from a pre-industrial age, unreflective of contemporary reality.
